markdownRemark.html: I recently purchased a beast of a phone from samsung. The galaxy note 9 is out for months already but I just acquired it two weeks ago. It’s freaking beautiful - aesthetically and powerful because of its 6gb ram processor, Quad hd screeen and the remote control S-pen. The all purpose gadget, I use it to replicate awesome art for this blog.
